preview.title: Default
preview.description: This interface provides a simple layout that it 800x470 pixels and has squared borders. Additionaly, it support the displaying of a title in the header area.

interaction.headerBgColor: background: #489CD4FF; /* Old browsers */ background: -moz-linear-gradient(top,#489CD4FF 14.249999999999998%,#489CD4FF 64.25%,#489CD4FF 100.0%); /* FF3.6+ */ background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%,#1e5799), color-stop(50%,#2989d8), color-stop(51%,#207cca), color-stop(100%,#7db9e8)); /* Chrome,Safari4+ */ background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top,#489CD4FF 14.249999999999998%,#489CD4FF 64.25%,#489CD4FF 100.0%); /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */ background: -o-linear-gradient(top,#489CD4FF 14.249999999999998%,#489CD4FF 64.25%,#489CD4FF 100.0%); /* Opera 11.10+ */ background: -ms-linear-gradient(top,#489CD4FF 14.249999999999998%,#489CD4FF 64.25%,#489CD4FF 100.0%); /* IE10+ */
interaction.footerBgColor: background: #395DEBFF; /* Old browsers */ background: -moz-linear-gradient(top,#395DEBFF 8.75%,#395DEBFF 50.0%,#395DEBFF 100.0%); /* FF3.6+ */ background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%,#1e5799), color-stop(50%,#2989d8), color-stop(51%,#207cca), color-stop(100%,#7db9e8)); /* Chrome,Safari4+ */ background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top,#395DEBFF 8.75%,#395DEBFF 50.0%,#395DEBFF 100.0%); /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */ background: -o-linear-gradient(top,#395DEBFF 8.75%,#395DEBFF 50.0%,#395DEBFF 100.0%); /* Opera 11.10+ */ background: -ms-linear-gradient(top,#395DEBFF 8.75%,#395DEBFF 50.0%,#395DEBFF 100.0%); /* IE10+ */
